You need to set date first
You need to select a car first

With a full charge of battery you can do at least
 3 very fast laps, or if driving not on maximum
 attack – more. After that, at the Nurburgring there
 is Tesla supercharger V3 which will get you a 90-95%
 of charge in 35 minutes and after a small break – you
 can carry on doing fast laps!

Equipped with DSG Dual-clutch gearbox, This car can
 be driven by anyone. Even gated fans like ourselves
 tried the Golf GTI with the DSG box and we where
 amazed how much fun it was, and safe at the same
 time! Together with paddle-shift or fully-automatic
 option, your track experience will be unforgettable!

The BMW 3-series is the standard of what a car
 should be like. A solid chassis, front engine,
 rear wheel drive and automatic Paddle-shift gearbox.
 The 6th generation of the 3series F30 is the
 younger brother of our E90.

BMW E90 330i is a fast and popular racing car in VLN
 endurance racing championship on the Nürburgring.
 We love the recipe of this car: RWD + very nice
 naturally aspirated inline-6 engine + great
 handling balance = car you can push quite easily
 to the limits and have lots of fun.

BMW E90 325i is one of the most popular racing cars
 in VLN endurance racing championship on the
 Nürburgring. We love the recipe of this car: RWD
 very nice naturally aspirated inline-6 engine
 + great handling balance = car you can push quite
 easily to the limits and have lots of fun.

We are the only rental company offering fast and FIA-safe REAL racing cars to drive on the Nurburgring Nordschleife. Every year we race and win podiums with them running the same setups. Feel the difference!
Apart from all race-spec safety equipment inside of the cars, we provide helmets, balaclavas and safety briefing without additional cost for all our drivers and their passengers.
For your ease of Nurburgring experience we offer you All-inclusive package. Book whole track experience here with just few clicks!
If you have booked our car and your plans has changed or you aren’t happy with the weather – you can change booking date without any fees.
